TopicTitle: Platform Enigma- an off topic chat thread.

Articles.Content:
I haven't seen much of Odin lately. Odd.

Beware, for I am watching.

Even if I don't respond right away. I do have a wife and a household to look after you know. Sometimes I gotta take care of things.

Considering I just tested a high-altitude bomber than can fire a whole SRB as a payload, I doubt you stand a chance

I'll vouch for your piloting skill. Even with somewhere around 500ms lag last night you were still flying circles around people. I was barely keeping up, and I was running at only 50ms.

Edited June 2, 2013 by OdinYggd
I had 800 ping with 25% packet loss last match in my J8M, and I still splashed two jets

Finally got the hang of using the Catalina.

I bought a new crew, spammed it for a bit with a biplane, and put all the points from it into gunner accuracy.

So now when I fly my catalina, the gun accuracy is level 12. People try to get near my Catalina and as I bank to aim for a target, the autoguns lock on and pew pew pew no survivors.

It was funny watching someone rage when their beaufighter got taken out by that.
Not that I don't love hearing about the flight exploits of people who're better than I'll ever be, but isn't there a WarThunder thread around here?

Good point.

I am glad to see this thread moving along at a modest pace though, a few posts an hour with a fairly reasonable conversation taking place in it.
Mods are awake! Post ponies anyway!!!!!
Discuss.
Chobbit how was your trip to le rainbow factory?
Not as much fun as the Toblerone Factory, but it was spicy, so thats a plus
Okay i find the muffins better there than at my school.Not to mention the cupcakes they sell there at the rainbow factory have a odd taste....

Oh that's what it was I forgot at the store earlier.

Went grocery shopping and forgot to get a toblerone to sample.

Well that's great not as bad as forgetting that humans can complete the circuit....my body can complete the circuit ,but i don't feel it not to mention there seems to be *pause to remeber the rest of the sentence* no no side effects.

Rage017:

I'm done with KSP for today...Jeez...Friggin' things wouldn't fly straight.
*Sleeping* What's this.... robot thing*Head hits table and Rockcoole goes to sleep*
Please enlighten me, What is this "sleep" y'all speak of?

Please enlighten me, What is this "sleep" y'all speak of?

EDIT: I tried to pull an allnighter. I regret this decision instantly. BUT I'M ALREADY COMMITTED.

EDITEDEDIT: Oh wow, Did I really just...well...crap...uhm...You saw nothing.
Has someone else noticed that off-topic is now called Junkyard?

Has someone else noticed that off-topic is now called Junkyard?

...Where have you BEEN?

...Where have you BEEN?

Its morning in Europe and like most normal people i sleep every night.
...Yes but it was changed...like fourteen or sixteen hours ago.

i wonder why?.................................
They think we off-topic people are lesser humans.
Please refer back a few pages to see LeonG17s glorious explanation on why.
Hey Canopener, you've missed a LOT

Canopener

Oh, my god. I'm dying laughing right now! XD
